sentences.en: BODE index was significantly related with the's respiratory questionnaire ( SGRQ ) scores and the frequency of visit.
sentences.cn: BODE指数 与圣乔治呼吸问卷 ( SGRQ ) 评分和病人就诊次数显著相关.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, Ezra Klein notes centrality of cars doesn't bode well for pricing carbon.
sentences.cn: 同时, 艾兹拉?克莱因(EzraKlein)注意到,“汽车仍为消费回落,对碳定价来说,并非预示着好兆头. ”

sentences.en: She says the way the bill was passed bodes ill for democracy.
sentences.cn: 她说议案通过的方式预示民主的恶运。

sentences.en: That does not bode well for the second half of the year.
sentences.cn: 这对下半年来说不是个好兆头.

sentences.en: The bad trading figures do not bode well for the company's future.
sentences.cn: 这些交易数额欠佳,预示公司前景不妙.

sentences.en: The more familiar Bode plot looks different in form only because the frequency is expressed logarithmically.
sentences.cn: 只有因为频率对数,被表达熟悉预示剧情看起来不同以形式.

sentences.en: The planets occupy orbits that are regularly spaced according to a pattern first noticed by Bode.
sentences.cn: 行星动行的轨道在空间的位置是有一定规则的,波特首先注意到了这种规律性.

sentences.en: The vote, on a procedural point, does not bode well for the passage of thornier legislation.
sentences.cn: 从程序上说, 这次选举对更为棘手的立法进程来说并不是个好兆头.

sentences.en: There was a brooding oppressiveness in the air that seemed to bode something.
sentences.cn: 空气闷热逼人,似乎要变天.

sentences.en: These events bode well for us.
sentences.cn: 这些事件对我们是好兆头.

sentences.en: These figures do not bode well for the company's future.
sentences.cn: 这些数字显示出公司的前景不妙.
这些信号预示着坏消息.

sentences.en: This does not bode well for your tip, my friend.
sentences.cn: 如果你是要小费,可不能故意这样啊, 朋友.

sentences.en: Zeng's remarks Bode how many generations of applause and recognition ah!
sentences.cn: 曾子一番话搏得了多少代人的掌声和认同啊!

trans.tran_en: If something bodes ill, it makes you think that something bad will happen in the future. If something bodes well, it makes you think that something good will happen.
If something bodes ill, it makes you think that something bad will happen in the future. If something bodes well, it makes you think that something good will happen.
